import { Component } from '@angular/core'; // import '../../../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; // import '../../../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.js'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-bar', templateUrl: './nav-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-bar.component.css'] }) export class NavBarComponent { onChange(event:any){ let element=event.target; let eid=element.id; console.log(eid); // alert(eid); if(element.checked){ console.log("it is checked"); if(eid==="id_hyd") checkedArray.push("Hyderabad"); else {if(eid==="id_blore") checkedArray.push("Bangalore"); else checkedArray.push("Kolkata");} } if(!element.checked){ if(eid in checkedArray) { for (let i = 0; i < checkedArray.length; i++) { if (checkedArray[i] === "splice") checkedArray.splice(i, 1); } } } console.log(checkedArray); } }
